summary: This is an email exchange regarding scheduling a meeting between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and Stacey Richman, an attorney, concerning Mark Epstein. The email confirms a meeting for October 28, 2019, at 3:00 p.m.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Attorney who is the recipient of an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding scheduling a meeting about Mark Epstein.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of a scheduled meeting between an Assistant United States Attorney and defense attorney Stacey Richman.

connections.description: Stacey Richman is an attorney scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein, indicating a legal representation relationship.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting Regarding Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting was scheduled for 3:00 p.m. between an Assistant United States Attorney and defense attorney Stacey Richman to discuss Mark Epstein.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was in communication with defense attorney Stacey Richman in October 2019.
A meeting was scheduled for October 28, 2019, at 3:00 p.m. to discuss Mark Epstein.
Mark Epstein was a subject of legal interest to federal prosecutors in the Southern District of New York as of late 2019.
